projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.subtitle: Full-Stack Web Application
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with modern web technologies. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Implemented responsive design and optimized for performance.

projects.title: AI Chat Application
projects.subtitle: Real-time Messaging with AI Integration
projects.description: An intelligent chat application that integrates AI-powered responses with real-time messaging. Features include group chats, file sharing, emoji reactions, and smart AI assistance for enhanced user experience.

projects.title: Machine Learning in Web Development
projects.subtitle: Published in Tech Journal 2024
projects.description: An in-depth analysis of how machine learning algorithms can be integrated into modern web development workflows. The paper explores practical implementations, performance considerations, and future trends in ML-powered web applications.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.subtitle: Interactive Analytics Platform
projects.description: A powerful data visualization dashboard that transforms complex datasets into interactive charts and graphs. Built with D3.js and React, it provides real-time analytics, customizable widgets, and export functionality for business intelligence.

projects.title: Sustainable Software Architecture
projects.subtitle: IEEE Conference Proceedings 2024
projects.description: Research paper focusing on sustainable software development practices and their impact on system performance and environmental footprint. Presents novel approaches to green computing in enterprise applications.

projects.title: Mobile Fitness Tracker
projects.subtitle: Cross-Platform Mobile Application
projects.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking application built with React Native. Features workout planning, progress tracking, social challenges, and integration with wearable devices. Includes offline functionality and data synchronization.
